long_description: Don't forget the Pistil Charm Hat when you're heading out the door. Soft, stretchy fabric and military-inspired style make it a perfect finishing touch to your look. Stretch-cotton fabric is soft, lightweight and breathable; internal polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. Adjustable back closure ensures a snug fit on nearly any head.
short_description: Don't forget the Pistil Charm Hat when you're heading out the door. Soft, stretchy fabric and military-inspired style make it a perfect finishing touch to your look.
